subtitle: a guide for teachers in elementary and secondary schools and institutions for teacher education.
title: Health education
by_statement: Report of the Joint Committee on Health Problems in Education of the National Education Association and the American Medical Association, with the cooperation of advisoy committees.
publishers: National Education Assn. of the United States

notes.value:
Foreword signed: Charles C. Wilson, chairman.
"First ed. in 1924, first revision, 1930, second revision 1941."
Earlier editions have title: Health education; a program for public schools and teacher training institutions.
